item.title: Gipsy (Level 4)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Product Manager (Level 5)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Fisherman (Level 6)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Cleaning lady (Level 6)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Presenter (Level 6)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 3)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Master Author (Level 9)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Architect (Level 2)
item.description: Added a submodule to a repository.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Architect (Level 1)
item.description: Added a submodule to a repository.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 2)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 1)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 1)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 1)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 8)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Butcher (Level 7)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 4)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Banker (Level 7)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 7)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Fisherman (Level 5)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 7)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.
